comment: Much sweeter than a typical Irish.
My uncle got me this in ireland and it's amazing. Notes of caramel, wood, and fruit with a surprisingly light color and a very smooth taste. Only 10,000 bottles released and only available in Europe.
This is simply delicious. Maple syrup on the nose, very balanced sweetness from the grain and super smooth finish.
Very smooth/drinkable yet complex on the finish. Some wood tannins, a bit dry. Definitely wish the abv was higher. But a fantastic Irish whiskey if only I could afford it.
Nice drop. Butterscotch, bailey, large degee of spicey oak, very slight off-balance in the wood but still good drop.
The smooth and creamy nose and taste of this whiskey is unforgettable. Pretty rare too
